name: HexConnect - Nature
description:
HexConnect - Nature is a quite simple and addictive puzzle game with continuous and regular level expansions and a lot of bonuses.

*** 120 levels, +10/week for FREE! ***

It is your task to connect all the numbers and empty tiles on each board with a single line, starting with no. 1, connecting the numbers in ascending order, and finishing on the largest number.

Feature overview:

• iCloud support: have your game progress saved in iCloud and sync'ed between all your devices!

• Highly detailed graphics: play in a nice colorful animated environment with plants and flowers, imagining as if you would be in a park or green field.

• Continuous level expansions: in addition to the default level pack with a total of 100 levels, you get 10 new free levels each week, and three new purchasable level packs with a total of 600 levels each month!

• Varying difficulty: the game offers a great variety of board shapes and difficulties to meet everyones needs

• Challenge: you can either go casual or strive for perfection and collect stars by completing levels with the least number of moves

• Easy control and Convenience: you need only one finger to play the game

• Fast game play: even if you have only a few minutes to play, you can pull up HexConnect - Nature and complete several levels

• Game Center support: your progress is tracked on Game Center leaderboards and you are rewarded with over 20 great achievements for your accomplishments
